extendedInfo.description: Machining, Milling, Turning, and operating the Lathe is no kids play. Although common in todayâs computerized world, most CNC machines are pre-programmed or are operated by a select few âintelligentsiaâ and specialists. Work with wood, you need a specialist. Work with metal, you need a specialist. Work with ice, you need a specialist. Work with Innovation, you need a specialist. Cutting, Drilling, Milling, despite being easy have stayed the forte of specialists. And yes, some of the best hobbyists in machining are specialists. So how does one become a specialist? Fundamentals, and only Fundamentals are elementary, my dear, to becoming a specialist. Without fundamentals, itâs not only difficult, itâs next to impossible not just to become a specialist, but a hobbyist too. Without fundamentals, one cannot touch the controls of a machine, any machine, a car, a rocket, and even a CNC machine. Without fundamentals, one doesnât even know what the controls are, leave aside controlling and manipulating these controls. In this first app in the world (both the Android world and Iphone world) which details all CNC Codes with diagrams, with equations, with explanations, we bring you simplicity. Simplicity by simplifying the fundamentals of CNC machining. The G codes and the X codes, the H codes and the M codes. You heard of it. We bring it to you. All from A through Z. And all of them with pictures and diagrams and drawings â beyond the typical run-of-the-mill definitions. So whatever arcs you choose, whichever axis you choose, whatever you want to drill into, whatever you plan to bore into, download the app, and keep pecking. Level: Introductory / BasicThis course has passed through Subject Matter Experts and has their approval. However, as with any technology, theories and logic changes with time and difference of opinion may arise. We do appreciate such conflict of opinion. If you wish that your conflict of opinion should be incorporated in a future edition of this app, please write to us (alongwith the relevant proof for the conflicting opinion) and we would be glad to do due diligence to it. As an example, despite the presence of ISO standards, most people still use FANUC standards which is manufacturer specific. Note:This app can be used offline.This app is FREE.This app is AD free.

reviews.title: Awesome. Learn quickly the fundamentals of cnc codes and. Programing.
reviews.comment: I love this apps. It has gave me more options and better understanding of cnc machinery. Nowni wiki finanllybunderstand all those codes Those I see in the computer.  Now I have some fundamentals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: I\'m a student in high school doing CNC work and this is extremely helpful when wanting to know what certain codes me. The UI could be a bit nicer and usable. How about a search bar?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Would give 5 stars if it could generate g code from dfx file types . Although thats probably a big ask.
reviews.author: Sheldon Booth

reviews.title: Setup
reviews.comment: Very good..my bos quit so I needed to tweak out his programs...what was he doin...heh..thanks for this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great but could be improved
reviews.comment: it should have the large codes too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nigel
reviews.comment: Has the basics but alot of codes are very brief or incorrect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Few typos
reviews.comment: \"Commom\", and the 2nd \"I\" in ASCII stands for Interchange, not Exchange.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fanuc specific
reviews.comment: Not all that helpful for okuma programmers or I assume mazak either
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok but...
reviews.comment: Gives me a lot of reference for writing complex codes, but I work a 6 axis tool grinder and a lot of this doesn\'t help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesone
reviews.comment: Works for helping figure everything out for a newbie
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok.
reviews.comment: Missing g80,g90,g94 and probably some others, but still a good list with pics in here.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Thank you. Helped me a lot
